title: Electronics: an introduction
creator_credit: Victor and Ellen Landweber and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Follows the development of electronic devices: a conductor, an electric light bulb, a diode vacuum tube, an amplifier, and the transistor. Concludes with a brief survey of electronic applications. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Victor and Ellen Landweber and BFA Educational Media
